mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HR( EMP_NO, DEP_NO, ADMIN_LEVEL, EMP_RANK, EMP_POSITION, EMP_NAME, EMAIL, EMP_PWD, ENTRY_DATE ) VALUES( HR_SEQ.nextval, #{depNo}, #{adminLevel}, #{empRank}, #{empPosition}, #{empName}, #{email}, #{empPwd}, #{entryDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT EMP_NO, D.DEP_NAME, EMP_RANK, EMP_POSITION, EMP_NAME, ENTRY_DATE FROM HR INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D on D.DEP_NO = HR.DEP_NO WHERE RESIGN_YN = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE HR SET EMP_NAME = #{empName}, EMAIL = #{email}, ENTRY_DATE = #{entryDate}, DEP_NO = #{depNo}, EMP_POSITION = #{empPosition}, EMP_RANK = #{empRank}, ADMIN_LEVEL = #{adminLevel} WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_DEPARTMENT_DEP_NO.nextval FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO DEPARTMENT(DEP_NO, DEP_NAME) VALUES (#{depNo}, #{depName})
mapper.select: SELECT DEP_NAME, TOTAL_NUM FROM ( SELECT DEP_NO, COUNT(EMP_NO) AS TOTAL_NUM FROM HR GROUP BY DEP_NO ) A INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D on D.DEP_NO = A.DEP_NO WHERE D.DEP_NO = #{depNo}
mapper.insert:
SELECT POST_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO POST( POST_NO, EMP_NO, BOARD_NO, TITLE, CATEGORY, CONTENT, ROOT, IS_NOTICE, START_TIME, END_TIME ) VALUES( #{postNo}, #{empNo}, 1, #{title}, '공지', #{content}, #{postNo}, 'Y', TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') )
INSERT INTO FILE_INFO( SEQ, POST_NO, FILE_EXT, FILE_SIZE, ORIGIN_NAME, SAVE_PATH ) VALUES( FILE_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{postNo}, #{fileExt}, #{fileSize}, #{originName}, #{savePath} )

INSERT INTO HR_TEST ( EMP_NO, DEP_NO, ADMIN_LEVEL, EMP_RANK, EMP_POSITION, EMP_NAME, EMAIL, EMP_PWD, PHONE, RESI_NO, ADDRESS, BANK, BANK_ACC ) VALUES ( HR_TEST_SEQ.nextval, #{depNo}, #{adminLevel}, #{empRank}, #{empPosition}, #{empName}, #{email}, #{empPwd}, #{phone}, #{resiNo}, #{address}, #{bank}, #{bankAcc} )
INSERT INTO ALARM( SEQ, START_TIME, END_TIME, MESSAGE ) VALUES ( ALARM_SEQ.nextval, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{message} )
mapper.select: SELECT MESSAGE FROM ALARM WHERE TO_CHAR((SELECT LAST_LOGIN FROM HR WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo}),'yyyy-mm-dd') < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND SYSDATE BETWEEN START_TIME AND END_TIME
mapper.update: UPDATE ALARM SET EXPIRED = 'Y' WHERE END_TIME < SYSDATE
